body:
On Mon, Feb 15, 2016 at 9:03 PM, Minux Ma <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Isn't consistent with the go tool a good thing?
>

Well, I have always assumed that core go commands where treated differently
compared to normal user commands.

>
> We probably should just document GOBIN in make.bash.
>

I'm +1 for documenting it, since I was surprised by the current behavior.
